com.swoval.files

Class Directory.Entry<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swoval.files.Directory.Entry<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The value wrapped in the Entry
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Directory.Entry<T>>
    Enclosing class:
    Directory<T>

    public static final class Directory.Entry<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Directory.Entry<T>>
    Container class for Directory entries. Contains both the path to which the path corresponds along with a data value.

      • Entry

        public Entry(java.nio.file.Path path,
             java.io.IOException exception,
             int kind)
        Create a new Entry
        Parameters:
        path - The path to which this entry corresponds blah
        exception - The IOException that was thrown trying to generate the value
        kind - The type of file that this entry represents. In the case of symbolic links, it can be both a link and a directory or file.

      • Entry

        public Entry(java.nio.file.Path path,
             T value,
             int kind)
        Create a new Entry
        Parameters:
        path - The path to which this entry corresponds blah
        value - The path derived value for this entry
        kind - The type of file that this entry represents. In the case of symbolic links, it can be both a link and a directory or file.

      • Entry

        public Entry(java.nio.file.Path path,
             T value)
        Create a new Entry using the FileSystem to check if the Entry is for a directory
        Parameters:
        path - The path to which this entry corresponds
        value - The path derived value for this entry
